SELECT salary_des, salary_account, salary_type, salary_total, salary_deduction, salary_amount, salary_date, salary_manager, salary_depart FROM salary s LEFT JOIN salary_details sd ON s.salary_id=sd.salary_id where s.student_id=#{id} and salary_date BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate}
